item.title: EP 81 - Angel Magick and The Lost Book Of Soyga
item.itunes:title: Angel Magick and The Lost Book Of Soyga
item.description:
Today we end up only covering one story: The mysterious, magical, and very real text known as the Book Of Soyga. No one knows who wrote it, where it came from, and the last 36 pages are a codebreakers worst nightmare. It went missing for 400 years and it took summoning an angel to help determine it’s origin. And now, you can not only read it online . . .you can interact with it.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Links:

Soyga: The Book That Kills (With Seed tool)

http://www.marianotomatis.it/blog.php?post=blog/20120423§ion=english

Book of Soyga

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Book_of_Soyga

John Dee

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Dee

Book of Soyga: The Mysterious Manuscript Translated by an Angel

https://www.urbanghostsmedia.com/2016/11/book-of-soyga-john-dee/

Mysteries surround a 16th century text on magic connected to John Dee that legend says carries a curse

https://www.thevintagenews.com/2018/03/21/book-of-soyga/

Holy Conversations: The Impact of the Mysterious Book of Soyga

https://www.ancient-origins.net/artifacts-ancient-writings/holy-conversations-impact-mysterious-book-soyga-003234

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!
